amendment.description: An amendment numbered 93 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funding for the Bureau of Ocean Energy Management and the Bureau of Safety and Environmental Enforcement to implement the National Marine Fisheries Service's stay agreement with Sierra Club expanding Rice's whale critical habitat.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
